sense.gloss: unrelated, unconnected, irrelevant, indifferent, divorced from, having nothing to do with one, being foreign to one
without relations (esp. of a deceased person), having no surviving relatives
unrelated to the teachings of Buddha, unable to be saved by Buddha

sdata.j: この↑金属↑↓きんぞく↓は↑錆↑↓さび↓とは↑無縁↑↓|むえん|↓です。
sdata.e: This metal is free of rust.

sdata.j: ↑当時↑↓とうじ↓、↑貧乏↑↓びんぼう↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓らにとっては↑無縁↑↓|むえん|↓なものと↑思↑↓おも↓われた。
sdata.e: Poverty seemed to have nothing to do with them in those days.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はその↑事件↑↓じけん↓とまったく↑無縁↑↓|むえん|↓ではない。
sdata.e: He is involved in the case a little.

sdata.j: ↑無鉛↑↓|むえん|↓レギュラーを１０ドル↑分↑↓ぶん↓いれてください。
sdata.e: Ten dollars of regular unleaded, please.

sdata.j: ↑無鉛↑↓|むえん|↓レギュラーを↑満↑↓まん↓タンにしてください。
sdata.e: I'd like a full tank of regular unleaded.

sdata.j: ↑現代↑↓げんだい↓の↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓で↑錬金術↑↓れんきんじゅつ↓といえば、↑比喩↑↓ひゆ↓↑的↑↓てき↓にしか↑使↑↓つか↓われない。モラルや↑羞恥心↑↓しゅうちしん↓と↑無縁↑↓|むえん|↓の↑政治↑↓せいじ↓↑屋↑↓や↓や↑宗教↑↓しゅうきょう↓↑家↑↓か↓が、↑不正↑↓ふせい↓な↑手段↑↓しゅだん↓でカネもうけをするときに。
sdata.e: In present day Japan, "alchemy" is only used metaphorically; to refer to improper means of making money by politicians or religious hucksters with no morals or shame.

sdata.j: ここ↑10↑↓じゅう↓↑年↑↓ねん↓、↑病気↑↓びょうき↓とは↑無縁↑↓|むえん|↓だ。
sdata.e: I haven't been sick for the past ten years.
